Subjects: historical poems; Henry VI; kings of England
_description: Heading for a pedigree of Henry VI — one cross-rhymed quatrain

BLHar2169.Transcription:
The pedegrewe be reyght lyneFownd and prevwyd by anerytaunceHow
                    Kynge Herry the Sexyth nowght coleyneYs trewe Kynge of Fraunce
BLHar2169.Note: Pedigree does not follow in this MS.
BLHar2169.Editions:
“A Fifteenth-Century Book of Arms.” 
             The Ancestor
         no. 3 (October, 1902): 185-213: 189.
